resources.string: Automatically adjust app colors based on wallpaper (Material You)
AI request timeout (seconds). Recommended to increase for thinking models.
Max tokens for AI response. Increase this if responses are truncated.
50% compression, faster upload, suitable for slow networks
70% compression, balanced speed and recognition accuracy
90% compression, more accurate recognition, but slower upload
Lower quality speeds up upload, higher quality improves AI recognition accuracy
Custom AI system prompt to guide how the AI analyzes the screen and performs tasks
Max steps must be greater than 0
Type what you want me to do...
AI can make mistakes. Please verify responses.
This is normal for reasoning models
API Key is empty. This provider will be unusable after saving.
Enable to choose different perception modes
Uses only screenshots for visual perception, relying on AI to understand the interface
Uses only UI structure, providing precise element info (Requires Root)
Uses both screenshot and UI tree for best accuracy (Requires Root)
Max wait time for UI tree retrieval
Limit UI tree depth sent to AI to reduce tokens and speed up response
Include unclickable elements (like text labels) in AI context, increases token usage
Record successful element matching patterns to improve future speed
Root permission denied. Please grant Futon in your Root manager and click below to request again.
Root permission not detected. If you installed KSU, SukiSU Ultra, Magisk, or other Root solutions, click below to request permission.
Clearing cache deletes all learned patterns, which may temporarily reduce matching accuracy.
Automatically select best method based on device capabilities
Execute input command via Root Shell, latency ~80ms
Execute sendevent command via Root Shell
Execute screencap command via Root Shell
Automatically try other methods when preferred method fails
Show warnings when certain execution methods are unavailable
Never capture secure windows (FLAG_SECURE), maximum privacy
Ask user when secure window is detected
Allow capturing all windows, including secure ones
Warning: Trusted Mode allows capturing sensitive apps (banking, password managers). Ensure you understand the risks before enabling.
Log all screenshot attempts on secure windows
Are you sure you want to clear the audit log? This cannot be undone.
Daemon not running - start via root shell
What would you like to do today?
Let me help you get things done
I can automate various actions on your phone
I am Futon AI Assistant. Tell me what you want to do, and I\'ll help you do it.
Suggest some things I can do today
Open WeChat and send a greeting to a friend
Open weather app and check today\'s weather
Open music app and play a song
Set an alarm for 8 AM tomorrow
Open news app and check top stories
Configure an AI provider to get started
API key or local model needed
Import downloaded GGUF model files from local storage
• GGUF model files\n• VLM requires mmproj file
VLM detected. Please import the mmproj file to use this model.
mmproj files are usually provided with the model, filename contains \"mmproj\".
Request timed out (%1$ds). If using a thinking model, try increasing timeout to %2$d seconds.
Request timed out (%1$ds). If using a thinking model (e.g., o1, Claude thinking), try increasing timeout to %2$d seconds.
Connection timed out. Check network or increase timeout to %d seconds.
DNS resolution failed: Cannot resolve %s. Check: 1) Network 2) DNS 3) Domain correctness.
Network unreachable: Cannot connect to %s. Check: 1) Server IP 2) Firewall 3) VPN/Proxy.
SSL handshake failed: Certificate error or incompatible TLS. If using proxy, check SSL config. Reason: %s
SSL connection error. If using VPN/Proxy, try disabling it. Reason: %s
Connection aborted by server or network. Details: %s
API Key or Base URL empty
AI returned empty response. Model might still be thinking. Try increasing timeout.
AI returned empty text. Model might be thinking. Try increasing timeout.
No text in Gemini response. Model might be thinking. Try increasing timeout.
Invalid API Key. Please check configuration.
Model not found. Check model name.
Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
Inference timed out (%ds). Try a smaller model or lower resolution.
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\"?
This will free up %s of storage.
This model is currently in use. You will be switched to cloud AI after deletion.
Use Android Neural Networks API to accelerate inference
Longer context handles complex tasks but uses more memory
More threads increase speed but consume more power
Device does not meet minimum requirements
Local model does not need to fetch model list
Local model does not require connection test
Manage system prompts and quick phrases
No templates yet. Tap + to create one.
No quick phrases yet. Tap + to create one.
Type trigger words to quickly insert predefined text
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\"?
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\"?
Built-in templates cannot be edited. You can create a copy based on this template.
Start with / for easy recognition, e.g. /open
Name of the currently focused app
Package name of the current app
Use LiteRT + OCR for enhanced UI element detection during automation
Select how touch events are injected
Lower resolution for faster inference (1 = full, 2 = half)
Target latency for perception loop (warning threshold)
Enable text recognition for detected UI elements
Filter out detections below this confidence threshold
Maximum number of capture buffers in pool
Select the touch input device for injection. Auto-detect is recommended.
Automatically select the best touchscreen device

Android\'s SELinux security mechanism blocks apps from directly accessing input devices. This fix adds temporary policy rules to allow the app to use Native IOCTL for input injection, achieving the lowest latency (<5ms).
This fix will be lost after reboot and needs to be re-applied. It only affects input device access and does not reduce overall system security.
SELinux policy updated. If Native IOCTL is still unavailable, use Android Input or Shell Sendevent methods instead - they are equally reliable.
Failed to fix SELinux policy. Consider using Android Input or Shell Sendevent methods as alternatives.
Configure how apps are discovered and provided to AI
Provide installed app information to AI for better task understanding
Include system apps in the app list provided to AI
Maximum number of apps to include in AI context
Reset all app discovery settings to defaults?
Enter alternative names for this app (one per line). AI will use these to better understand your commands.
Request timeout (%1$d seconds). Consider increasing timeout to %2$d seconds for thinking models.
Connection timeout. Check network or increase timeout to %1$d seconds.
DNS resolution failed: cannot resolve %1$s. Check network connection or domain name.
Network unreachable: cannot connect to %1$s. May be firewall or proxy issue.
SSL handshake failed: certificate verification error. Check proxy SSL config if using one.
SSL connection error: may be certificate issue or network interference. Detail: %1$s
Connection aborted: may be proxy/VPN or firewall issue. Detail: %1$s
Connection failed: cannot connect to %1$s. Check URL or proxy settings. Detail: %2$s
Invalid API Key, please check configuration
Rate limit exceeded, please try again later
Model not found, please check model name
Service temporarily unavailable, please try again later (%1$d): %2$s
AI returned empty response, model may still be thinking. Consider increasing timeout.
Response blocked due to recitation issue
No text content in AI response, model may still be thinking. Consider increasing timeout.
API Key or Base URL is empty
Screenshot or UI context is required
API Key for %1$s is not configured
Local inference engine is not configured
Server will stop in %s due to inactivity
Start the daemon to enable automation
Automatically stop daemon when app is closed
Long press and drag to reorder. Only available sources can be reordered.
Use sources in configured priority order
Prefer sources with higher success rate
Pre-load model on app start for faster first inference
Are you sure you want to reset all inference statistics? This action cannot be undone.
Allow Tasker to trigger automation tasks
Enable HTTP server for LAN access
Only allow connections from trusted networks
When enabled, the LAN server will only accept connections from devices on the WiFi networks you specify. This adds an extra layer of security by restricting access to known networks.
No networks added. Server accepts connections from any WiFi network.
Certificate import is not yet available
Location permission is needed to detect WiFi network name. Tap to grant permission.
Location permission and service must be enabled to detect WiFi network name. Tap to grant permission.
If permission is already granted, enable location service in settings.
Automatically rotate token when IP address changes or at scheduled intervals
How often to automatically rotate the access token
Scan for available WiFi networks to add
Are you sure you want to clear all security logs?
Enable chaos testing to simulate failures and test recovery
Simulate a daemon crash to test recovery mechanisms
Inject network latency to test timeout handling
Simulate memory pressure to test buffer release
Simulate authentication failure to test re-auth flow
Futon needs notification permission to show foreground service notifications. This ensures stable background operation for automation tasks and LAN server.
The LAN server requires notification permission to run as a foreground service. Without this permission, the server may be stopped by the system.
Notification permission not granted. Some features may not work properly.
Let\'s set up your device for automation
Futon requires root access and daemon setup to function. Are you sure you want to exit?
Module installed. Reboot recommended for auto-start.
Install OCR and detection models for on-device inference
Skipping model deployment will disable OCR and on-device detection features. You can deploy models later from Settings.
Generate authentication keys for daemon communication
Root access is not available. Please ensure your device is rooted.
SELinux is blocking operations. Try setting SELinux to permissive mode.
Failed to check root status. Please try again.
Failed to deploy daemon binary. Please check storage permissions.
Failed to generate security keys. Please try again.
Failed to deploy public key to daemon. Please check root permissions.
Failed to start daemon. Please check root permissions.
Failed to connect to daemon. Please try again.
Module installed but daemon not responding. Please reboot your device.
App version not compatible with module
Model manifest could not be loaded
Re-copy models from app assets to daemon directory
Check model integrity using SHA256 checksums

Maximum number of elements to include in annotation

This will remove the provider and all its models. This action cannot be undone.
